channel.title: Home on Custom Twemoji API
channel.description: Recent content in Home on Custom Twemoji API

item.title: üíª  Running Locally
item.description: Clone the API repository (ZIP download) Install Ruby if you haven't already: www.ruby-lang.org (version) Install Bundler if you haven't already: gem install bundler Install Ruby dependencies with bundler: bundle Start application Use Shotgun if you want reloading with code changes: shotgun -p 9292 Otherwise use Rack: rackup Go to http://localhost:9292 in a browser to ensure it redirects to https://github.com/custom-twemoji/custom-twemoji-api Stop application: Ctrl + C

item.title: GET `/custom_faces/{base_emoji}`
item.description: Use this endpoint to combine face Twemojis using one as a base. Arguments Name Required Type Default base_emoji ‚úÖ String (emoji) none head ‚ùå Strings (comma separated emojis) base emoji cheeks ‚ùå Strings (comma separated emojis) base emoji mouth ‚ùå Strings (comma separated emojis) base emoji nose ‚ùå Strings (comma separated emojis) base emoji eyes ‚ùå Strings (comma separated emojis) base emoji eyewear ‚ùå Strings (comma separated emojis) base emoji headwear ‚ùå Strings (comma separated emojis) base emoji other ‚ùå Strings (comma separated emojis) base emoji Chart.

item.title: GET `/faces`
item.description: Use this endpoint to find which Twemojis are supported as faces. Arguments No arguments specific to this endpoint. See arguments available to all /faces endpoints. Example Request: CUSTOM_TWEMOJI_API=https://customtwemojiapi.com/v1; curl $CUSTOM_TWEMOJI_API/faces Response: 1{ 2... 3"data": { 4"1f383": { 5"0": "head", 6"1": "headwear", 7... 8}, 9"1f479": { 10"0": "head", 11"1": "head", 12... 13}, 14}, 15... 16}

item.title: ‚úèÔ∏è  Contributing
item.description: This project is open for anyone to contribute or raise issues. Before contributing a large change, please raise an issue first to confirm it fits within the scope of the API. Fork the API repository Follow the steps on the Running Locally page Make and test changes locally Run Rubocop to check the formatting of files: rubocop When satisfied with your changes, open a pull request into the main branch including screenshots of your testing evidence

item.title: üöò  Licensing
item.description: API Code licensed under the MIT License Graphics licensed under CC-BY 4.0 Twemoji licensing can be found on Twitter Not affiliated with Twitter Inc. or any of their affiliations Website Theme: Compose Code licensed under the Apache 2.0 Twemoji licensing can be found on Twitter Not affiliated with Twitter Inc. or any of their affiliations

item.title: GET `/custom_faces/mashup`
item.description: Use this endpoint to combine two or more face Twemojis. Arguments Name Required Type Default amount ‚ùå Integer 2 emojis ‚ùå Strings (comma separated emojis) none use_every_feature ‚ùå Boolean false head ‚ùå Float 1.

item.title: GET `/custom_faces/random`
item.description: Use this endpoint to randomly combine face Twemojis. Check out the live demo! Arguments Name Required Type Default head ‚ùå Float 1.0 cheeks ‚ùå Float 0.5 mouth ‚ùå Float 0.5 nose ‚ùå Float 0.

item.title: GET `/faces/{emoji}`
item.description: Use this endpoint to get a specific Twemoji that is supported as a face. Arguments No arguments specific to this endpoint. See arguments available to all /faces endpoints. Example Request: CUSTOM_TWEMOJI_API=https://customtwemojiapi.com/v1; curl $CUSTOM_TWEMOJI_API/faces/1f47b Response: 1{ 2... 3"data": { 4"1f47b": { 5"0": "head", 6"1": "eyes", 7"2": "eyes", 8"3": "eyes", 9"4": "mouth" 10} 11}, 12... 13}

item.title: GET `/faces/random`
item.description: Use this endpoint to get a random Twemoji that is supported as a face. Arguments No arguments specific to this endpoint. See arguments available to all /faces endpoints. Example Request: CUSTOM_TWEMOJI_API=https://customtwemojiapi.com/v1; curl $CUSTOM_TWEMOJI_API/faces/rabdom Response: 1{ 2... 3"data": { 4"1f608": { 5"0": "head", 6"1": "head", 7"2": "head", 8"3": "mouth", 9"4": "eyes", 10"5": "eyes" 11} 12}, 13"links": { 14"self": "https://customtwemojiapi.com/v1/faces/1f608" 15}, 16... 17}
